author: Ellen Mitchell
description: The U.S. military is set to temporarily move about 700 Marines to Los Angeles, further increasing military presence in the city after the Trump administration ordered 2,000 California National Guard troops there over the weekend, U.S. Northern Command announced Monday. The command has activated the Marine infantry battalion that Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth placed on…
title: Pentagon to deploy about 700 Marines to Los Angeles

author: Amie Parnes
description: The fight between President Trump and California Gov. Gavin Newsom over unrest in Los Angeles reached new heights on Monday, with Trump saying he’d support the arrest of one of the top Democrats in the country and a possible presidential contender in 2028. Escalating protests in the City of Angels over raids by Immigration and…
title: Trump, Newsom collide over LA unrest

author: Mike Lillis
description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) is hammering President Trump over the clashes in Los Angeles, saying the president is purposefully escalating tensions to distract the country from a volatile economy. Speaking to reporters in the Capitol, Jeffries railed against Trump’s aggressive deportation policies and defended the rights of Americans to protest such government actions…
title: Jeffries says Trump ‘intentionally’ inflaming unrest in Los Angeles

author: Elizabeth Crisp
description: Rep. Elise Stefanik (R-NY) has labeled Gov. Kathy Hochul (D-NY) a "hypocrite" for criticizing President Trump's National Guard deployment in California while she used the New York National Guard to secure state-run prisons, and has suggested she may run against Hochul for governor in 2026.
title: Stefanik calls Hochul ‘total hypocrite’ over National Guard use

author: Brett Samuels
description: President Trump hosted a roundtable event to tout an initiative in Republicans’ massive reconciliation package that would provide $1,000 for newborn babies to be put into an investment account. “This is a pro-family initiative that will help millions of Americans harness the strength of our economy to lift up the next generation,” Trump said. “And…
title: Trump touts investments for newborns in reconciliation bill

author: Brett Samuels
description: President Trump on Monday mocked climate activist Greta Thunberg after Israel intercepted a boat she was on carrying aid for Gaza. “She’s a strange person. She’s a young, angry person,” Trump told reporters when asked for his message to Thunberg. “She’s certainly different. I think she has to go to an anger management class. That’s…
title: Trump says Greta Thunberg should go to anger management

author: Gordon G. Chang, opinion contributor
description: The Chinese regime, which is mobilizing all of society for war, is now unstable.
title: Despite military purges, China’s next war ‘could be imminent’ and spread fast

author: Kyle Balluck
description: President Trump is scheduled to participate in an Invest America roundtable event Monday afternoon at the White House. A White House official confirmed to NewsNation that Trump at the event, which is scheduled to begin a 2 p.m. EDT, will highlight $1,000 “Trump Account” investments for kids to be included in his GOP megabill. Watch…
title: Watch live: Trump participates in Invest America roundtable

author: Brett Samuels
description: President Trump’s travel ban targeting a dozen countries went into effect on Monday, the latest step by the White House to crack down on the number of individuals entering the U.S. The new policy fully restricts the entry into the United States of nationals from Afghanistan, Chad, the Republic of the Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Eritrea,…
title: New Trump travel ban takes effect

author: Julia Shapero
description: Elon Musk rebuked his own artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Grok on Sunday, after it incorrectly verified a false X post purporting to show the tech billionaire taking a swipe at White House deputy chief of staff Stephen Miller.  The fabricated post, which has since been deleted, took advantage of the explosive rift between Musk and…
title: Musk rebukes Grok for verifying fabricated X post

author: Caroline Bleakley
description: Two people were killed in a shooting in front of the Bellagio Fountains on the Las Vegas Strip, and the suspect is still at large.
title: 2 killed in shooting near Bellagio Fountains on Las Vegas Strip

author: H. Sterling Burnett, Opinion Contributor
description: Provisions from the REINS Act would give Congress the power to review and approve major regulations.
title: Congress should seize this big, beautiful chance to REIN in regulatory overreach

author: Rep. Nikki Budzinski (D-Ill.), opinion contributor
description: The New Dem Coalition is launching a series of community events to gather feedback on issues such as immigration, clean energy and paid family leave, in order to create a bipartisan path forward that addresses the needs of working families and serves the people better.
title: Democrats are looking for answers — outside Washington

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Approximately 500 U.S. Marines are “prepared to deploy” to Los Angeles amid rising tensions between protesters and law enforcement over President Trump’s immigration policies, according to a statement from U.S. Northern Command. The Marines are “in a prepared to deploy status should they be necessary to augment and support the [Defense Department’s] protection of federal…
title: 500 Marines ‘prepared to deploy’ to LA: Northern Command

author: Dominick Mastrangelo
description: “60 Minutes” correspondent Scott Pelley said a potential settlement between Paramount, CBS’s parent company, and President Trump in the wake of his lawsuit against the media company would have a negative impact on the news organization’s reputation. “It will be very damaging to CBS, to Paramount, to the reputation of those companies,” Pelley said during…
title: Settling Trump lawsuit, apologizing would be ‘very damaging’: ’60 Minutes’ correspondent

author: Saul Elbein
description: The deep oceans have crossed a crucial boundary that threatens their ability to provide the surface with food and oxygen, a new study finds. Nearly two-thirds of the ocean below 200 meters, or 656 feet, as well as nearly half of that above, have breached “safe” levels of acidity, according to findings published on Monday in Global…
title: ‘Ticking time bomb’: Ocean acidity crosses vital threshold, study finds

author: Alexander J. Motyl, opinion contributor
description: The longer and nastier their relations, the worse for both — and the better for America and the world.
title: Let Trump and Musk ‘fight for a while’

author: Sarakshi Rai
description: British Ambassador to the U.S. Peter Mandelson is appealing to Congress to think again about the proposed new retaliatory tax on certain foreign investment in the US. “I think that there’s something wrong in principle that you should punish a country’s businesses and individuals in America because you don’t like what their governments are doing…
title: Congress should think again about foreign investor tax: UK ambassador to US

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Border czar Tom Homan said Monday that California Gov. Gavin Newsom (D) and Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass (D) have not crossed the line amid tensions between law enforcement and immigration raid protesters, but they, like everyone else, are “not above the law.” In an interview on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe,” Homan sought to clarify earlier…
title: Homan: Newsom, Bass haven’t crossed line but ‘not above the law’

author: Steven Lubet, opinion contributor
description: Everything might be bigger in Texas, but that does not justify legislating an unmistakably religious schoolroom display of 11 or 12 commandments.
title: Why the Ten Commandments in Texas classrooms could become a dozen

author: Elizabeth Crisp
description: Top U.S. and Chinese officials are meeting in London on Monday to try to fortify the countries’ temporary trade truce, which is on track to expire in August. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick and U.S. trade representative Jamieson Greer are in the U.K. for the talks with Chinese Vice President He Lifeng.…
title: US, Chinese trade negotiators meeting in London

author: Juan Williams, opinion contributor
description: President Lincoln had a team of rivals. President Trump has a team of conspiracy mongers.
title: Trump and Vance are hanging out with conspiracy theorists and kooks

author: Katie Millard
description: While other schools have been cracking down on students using artificial intelligence, the Ohio State University says all of its students will be using AI starting this fall.
title: Ohio State says every student will become fluent in AI with new program
